---
category: news
title: "This robot packs a punch"
excerpt: "A team from China’s Qibot Robot Company has reportedly built the world's fastest boxer bot. Dubbed Qibbot, the single-armed robot can extend its one arm nearly 5 ft, stands more than 6 ft tall and can be teleoperated. Further, Qibbot’s developers suggest that the robot’s response delay time of 12 milliseconds makes it the world's fastest."
